titles: A true rllation [sic] of a most strange and wonderful tempest which hapned on the 29th of June 1680. at Newtowu [sic]-Stewart in Ireland. as it was communicated in a letter by a gentleman to his friend in London.
publisher: Printed for William English at the Crown in Chancery-Lane,
notes: Date of publication supplied by Wing.
Title erroneously locates Newton-Stewart in Ireland; it is in Scotland.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Texas, Austin Library.
keywords: Severe storms --  Scotland --  Newton Stewart --  Early works to 1800.
